mapper.prompt:
Please analyse this image and extract all information regarding car repairs.
The goal is to fill a database with the corresponding columns: Summary, Date of repair, list of repairs done, price

spec.name: imageUploadType
spec.label: How would you like to specify an image?

nested.help: URL address to a public resource of the image. For example, `https://getmyimage.com/myimage.png`.
nested.name: imageUrl
nested.label: Image URL

mappable.help: URL address to a public resource of the image. For example, `https://getmyimage.com/myimage.png`.

nested.help: Binary data of the image. For example, you can retrieve the binary data of your image using the `HTTP: Get a file` module.
nested.name: imageFileData
nested.label: Image File

mapper.prompt:
Please analyse this image and extract all information regarding car repairs.
The goal is to fill a database with the corresponding columns: Summary, Date of repair, list of repairs done, price

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: A summary of the repairs done

parameters.name: repairdate
parameters.description: The date when the car was repaired. Might be the invoice date.

parameters.name: listofrepairs
parameters.description: A list of the repairs done. This contains parts, working hours and every line item

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: price of the repairs done overall.

nested.name: valueExamples
nested.label: Value Examples
nested.help: Provide one or more examples of a possible value for this parameter. The more examples you provide the more accurate the output is going to be.

nested.name: valueExamples
nested.label: Value Examples
nested.help: Provide one or more examples of a possible value for this parameter. The more examples you provide the more accurate the output is going to be.

nested.name: definitionName
nested.label: Definition Name
nested.help: Name of the object definition specified in the **Object Definitions** parameter.

spec.name: name
spec.label: Parameter Name
spec.help:
The parameter's name.
1. The first character must either be alphabet or underscore. It should not start with the digit.
2. No commas and blanks are allowed.
3. No special symbols other than underscore are allowed.

spec.name: description
spec.label: Description
spec.help: Brief description of the parameter. It defines how the model will proceed with this parameter. For example, `Latitude and Longitude of the location.` in case you want to specify that AI should search for coordinates in the provided text.

spec.name: type
spec.label: Data Type

nested.name: valueExamples
nested.label: Value Examples
nested.help: Provide one or more examples of a possible value for this parameter. The more examples you provide the more accurate the output is going to be.

nested.name: valueExamples
nested.label: Value Examples
nested.help: Provide one or more examples of a possible value for this parameter. The more examples you provide the more accurate the output is going to be.

spec.help:
An appropriate data type of the parameter. Array should be used when multiple occurences of similar data type may take a place.
For example, use Array (text) type for text where coordinates of multiple locations are mentioned and you would like them to be extracted.

spec.name: isRequired
spec.label: Is Parameter Required?
spec.help: If this is set to `Yes` AI will be forced to generate a value in the output even if there's no such a value detected in the text.

nested.name: definitionName
nested.label: Definition Name
nested.help: Name of the object definition specified in the **Object Definitions** parameter.

spec.help: Optional. Use only when entering a date range.
spec.name: end
spec.label: End Time
